mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_email, member_password, member_name, member_nickname, member_phone, member_shoes_size, member_register, member_login, member_messege_info, member_email_info, member_grade) VALUES (#{member_email}, #{member_password}, #{member_name}, #{member_nickname}, #{member_phone}, #{member_shoes_size}, #{member_register}, #{member_login}, #{member_messege_info}, #{member_email_info}, 'BRONZE')
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where member_email = #{member_email}
select count(*) from member where MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{member_nickname}

SELECT member_grade, member_email, member_password, member_name, member_phone, member_shoes_size, authority FROM member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN AUTHORITIES auth on mem.member_email = auth.username WHERE mem.member_email = #{member_email}
mapper.update: update member set member_login = sysdate where member_email=#{member_email}
mapper.select: select sl.*, fp.FINAL_PRICE, fp.PAYMENT_YN from show_live sl, (select * from auction_final_person where FINAL_BIDER = #{member_email}) fp where sl.showlive_no = fp.showlive_no
select t1.buyid, t1.member_email, t1.pid, t1.price, t1.size_type, t1.status1, t2.img1 from buy t1, resell_product t2 where t1.pid = t2.pid and t1.member_email= #{member_email}
select t1.buyid, t1.member_email, t1.pid, t1.price, t1.size_type, t1.status1, t2.img1 from sale t1, resell_product t2 where t1.pid = t2.pid and t1.member_email= #{member_email}
